channel.title: Blog/Site Topics
channel.description:
Well I have my money and hosting so the question is [b]what to blog about?[/b]
This is probably a retarded question and yes I have googled it, I really dont know what to write a blog or site about. "Web design" articles are just boring and are viewed by (few)complete idiots so I'm trying to avoid it. "Gaming" sites just exist too damn much, I mean even the successful ones are gay. "Politics" wouldn't work because no one agrees with me, etc.
I am thinking a review site, like go find the most idiotic shit out there (eg. funny videos) and repost/comment on them.
Also, does [b]anyone know if its successful to have one blog 'not based' on anything[/b], just a bunch of random shit example "Seth Godin's riffs on marketing, respect, and the ways ideas spread."
Thanks for accepting my idiocy.

item.title: Blog/Site Topics
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

As stated before, browse the internet and look for interesting articles. Then you do a little research, and make your own article. Maybe add your opinion to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog/Site Topics
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Blog about interesting things you encounter, your opinions on things or tips and tricks that you might’ve found out about.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog/Site Topics
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

nah that’s not what people want try surfing the Inet all day and any topics or articles you come across that are interesting post about or any funny pics or what ever dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog/Site Topics
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

My life is boring as hell:(, maybe I can just imagine what I want my life to be about and lie about it being true:)

Read full topic

item.title: Blog/Site Topics
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:243254”][quote author=belbn link=topic=319572.msg2532011#msg2532011 date=1226519667]
Also, does anyone know if its successful to have one blog ‘not based’ on anything, just a bunch of random shit example “Seth Godin’s riffs on marketing, respect, and the ways ideas spread.”
[/quote]

Well it depends how you do it and if it happens to catch on - Maddox did alright.

But to be honest, if you don’t know what you should blog about you shouldn’t be doing it. Just write about stuff you’re interested in, not page fillers.[/quote]

All I’m doing is page filling. Whatever people are interested in these days I could give a fuck about. To be honest I do not know what my interests are, I find topic, I write about it, plain and simple.

Read full topic
